algal_leaf.name: Algal Leaf Spot (Red Rust)
algal_leaf.symptoms: Orange or reddish-brown velvety spots on leaves. Common in humid conditions or weak plants.
algal_leaf.organic_control: Prune overcrowded branches to improve air circulation. Ensure proper soil drainage.
algal_leaf.chemical_control: Spray Copper Oxychloride (0.25%) or Bordeaux mixture.
algal_leaf.prevention: Avoid water stress and ensure balanced potash (K) application.

anthracnose.name: Anthracnose
anthracnose.symptoms: Brown, necrotic lesions on leaves that may spread. Leaves often dry up and fall.
anthracnose.organic_control: Remove and burn infected leaves. Apply Neem cake to soil.
anthracnose.chemical_control: Spray Thiophanate Methyl or Copper Oxychloride.
anthracnose.prevention: Maintain proper shade regulation and avoid waterlogging.

bird_eye_spot.name: Bird's Eye Spot
bird_eye_spot.symptoms: Small circular spots with a gray center and reddish-brown margin (looks like an eye).
bird_eye_spot.organic_control: Remove infected leaves. Maintain proper shade to lower temperature.
bird_eye_spot.prevention: Ensure adequate Potassium (K) levels in fertilizer.

brown_blight.name: Brown Blight
brown_blight.symptoms: Brown patches with concentric rings and tiny black dots.
brown_blight.organic_control: Remove infected foliage. Improve air circulation.
brown_blight.prevention: Protect plants from sun scorch and mechanical injury.

gray_light.name: Gray Blight
gray_light.symptoms: Similar to Brown Blight but spots turn gray/white with concentric rings.
gray_light.organic_control: Clean plucking table. Remove infected debris.
gray_light.chemical_control: Spray Copper Oxychloride or Thio-phanate methyl.
gray_light.prevention: Avoid injury to leaves during plucking.

red_leaf_spot.name: Red Leaf Spot (Purple Mite/Fungal)
red_leaf_spot.symptoms: Reddish-purple discoloration or lesions on mature leaves.
red_leaf_spot.organic_control: Spray Neem Oil (3%) or wettable sulfur.
red_leaf_spot.chemical_control: Specific acaricides if mite-induced, or Copper fungicides.

white_spot.name: White Spot / Blister Blight
white_spot.symptoms: Small white or translucent blisters/spots on young leaves.
white_spot.organic_control: Reduce humidity. Prune infected shoots immediately.
white_spot.chemical_control: Spray Copper Oxychloride mixed with Nickel Chloride.
white_spot.prevention: Adjust shade trees to allow more sunlight.

healthy.name: Healthy Tea Leaf
healthy.symptoms: Leaf is green, vibrant, and free of lesions.
